sub_fields.label: Add bottom space
sub_fields.name: add_bottom_space
sub_fields.instructions: Use this option if you're planning to use two section title modules one after another with different backgrounds

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: For other option, please pass only the number (without px)

choices.80: Extra large (80px) - default bottom padding for section

sub_fields.label: Title size
sub_fields.name: title_size
sub_fields.instructions: Font size of the card title, default: 32px

sub_fields.label: Limit posts
sub_fields.name: limit_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Use -1 to display all available posts

sub_fields.label: Limit posts
sub_fields.name: limit_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Use -1 to display all available posts

sub_fields.label: Fill image?
sub_fields.name: fill_image
sub_fields.instructions: If checked - the image will fill entire space

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Auto means the columns sizes will be automatically optimized to the container width
